name: Marble-Kun's Amazing Maze
description:
Welcome to Marble-Kun's Amazing Maze! In this game, you must guide Marble-Kun on an amazing journey through a dastardly labyrinth!

This game was made for Ludem Dare 37 with the theme of "One Room". We considered a labyrinth to be a single room made up of many corridors and traps, and thus we felt it fit the theme.

Programming/SFX by Myself

Art by Lauren Russo AKA Rock-Bomber: http://rock-bomber.com
